me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.api.rotation

Interface RotationManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRotationManager

    public interface RotationManager
    The main rotation manager; controls all rotations
    Author:
    DonkeyCore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void force(Rotation r)
      Force the countdown to start, no matter how many players there are
      Rotation getRotation(int id)
      Get a rotation by its ID
      Rotation getRotation(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get a rotation based on a player who is currently in it
      Rotation[] getRotations()
      Get all of the currently active rotations

      Have a player join any available rotation

      boolean leave(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean kicked)
      Have a player leave the rotation they are in

      Set the next minigame to be played
      void shutdown()
      Stop all rotations, kick everyone from rotations, and stop next rotation cycles
      void start(Rotation rotation)
      Called to choose a minigame and begin the countdown if allowed

    • Method Detail

      • join

        boolean join(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Have a player join any available rotation
        Parameters:
        player - The player to join
        Returns:
        Whether there were any available rotations to put the player in

      • join

        boolean join(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
             int id)
        Have a player join a specific rotation
        Parameters:
        player - The player to join
        id - The ID of the rotation to be joined
        Returns:
        Whether the rotation was available to put the player in

      • leave

        boolean leave(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
              boolean kicked)
        Have a player leave the rotation they are in
        Parameters:
        player - The player to leave
        kicked - Whether the player was kicked
        Returns:
        Whether the player was found in a rotation and removed

      • start

        void start(Rotation rotation)
        Called to choose a minigame and begin the countdown if allowed
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation to execute the process for

      • getRotations

        Rotation[] getRotations()
        Get all of the currently active rotations
        Returns:
        An array of Rotation instances

      • getRotation

        Rotation getRotation(int id)
        Get a rotation by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the rotation
        Returns:
        An instance of Rotation

      • getRotation

        Rotation getRotation(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Get a rotation based on a player who is currently in it
        Parameters:
        player - The player inside the rotation
        Returns:
        An instance of Rotation or null if the player is not in a rotation

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Stop all rotations, kick everyone from rotations, and stop next rotation cycles

      • force

        void force(Rotation r)
        Force the countdown to start, no matter how many players there are
        Parameters:
        r - The rotation to force

      • setNext

        void setNext(java.lang.Class<? extends Minigame> mclazz)
        Set the next minigame to be played
        Parameters:
        mclazz - The class of the next minigame
